item.title: Potholes/cracks in road dangerous for cyclist, 20th February
item.description:
///beard.later.exist These cracks & potholes are dangerous whilst I’m cycling. I have to cycle further into the road to avoid them but oncoming vehicles are not giving way to me despite parked vehicles being on their side!!! There will be an impact soon between a vehicle & a cyclist trying to avoid these potholes/cracks!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Reddings Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole abysmal repair this week. B4063 near Arle Court roundabout, 20th February
item.description:
A abysmal repair was carried out this week to the pothole on the B4063 close to Arle Court roundabout, just west of Briarfields Caravan Park. The repair doesn’t cover the hole, is barely any better than before and looks like it won’t last a month. It is so bad that cars still have to drive around the hole. What3Words ///track.friend.aims
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several black bags thrown into over grown bush which back on to the stream, 20th February
item.description:
Where there is metal fencing & a concrete area for vehicle to stop here there are now lots of black bags dumped into the opening off bushes that back onto the stream.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continual flooding along this stretch of road., 20th February
item.description:
As you turn left off the main road (B4063 ) , just past the first bend there is now alot of mud now along the edge of this road due to continual flooding and water hang that you don’t seem to be investigating. The path is unusable due to the amount of mud , flood water & now several fallen “ flood “signs”
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
